Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 284 Board of Sanitation Claims

EDITOR’S NOTE: There are no sections in Chapter 284. This chapter has been established to provide a place for cross references and any future legislation.

CROSS REFERENCES

Filthy or undesirable accumulations - see GEN. OFF. 660.17

Dumping - see GEN. OFF. 660.14

Unclean habitations - see GEN. OFF. Ch. 668

Garbage and rubbish generally - see S.U. & P. S. Ch. 1062
